attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think u could make so much money out of it and also it would get rid of all the dodgy dealers. it is used 4 medicinal perposes so legalise it and the revenue would be able to increase our financial stability of our country. so many people now smoke it that the demand is larger than the supply so come on get the ball rolling!

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/legalcannabis/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
